paymentprofiles.cmd: declare @count int; select @count=count(*) from vPaymentProfileFetch2 where [ContactId] = '2-350161'; with v as (select row_number() over( order by CreatedDate desc) as rnum, @count count, [Primary],[Type],[AccountNumberDisplay],[ExpirationMonth],[ExpirationYear],[CardHolderName],[StreetAddress],[City],[State],[PostalCode],[Country],[CreatedDate],[CreatedBy],[UpdatedDate],[UpdatedBy] from vPaymentProfileFetch2 where [ContactId] = '2-350161') select * from v where rnum between 1 and 10000 order by rnum;
